projects.title: Real Estate Application
projects.bodyText:
- Lead the React Native team for one of the largest Real Estate company in Australia.
 - Developed Application from scratch, met tight deadlines, worked with tough clients.

projects.title: Content Authoring Tool
projects.bodyText:
- Developed Elements In an Autoring Tool for one the largest publishing and education company. 
 -  Provided Ability to enhance the Digital Content Creation via Track Manager and Comment Manager Tool.

projects.title: Microservices for Authoring Tool
projects.bodyText:
- Lead the Development team for development of microservice responsible for copying the TOC contents. 
 - Lead the Team responsible for Learning Objective Creation of Content Authoring Tool. 
 - Refreactored the Leagacy Code to make sure class components are removed and standalone component structure is followed

projects.title: Parent Connect React Native Application
projects.bodyText:
- Was part of React Native Development team for one of the largest Playscholl in India.
 - Developed modules where parent can track activity and get real time view of their kid.
